name: Vodka Martini
description: A classic cocktail made with vodka and dry vermouth
instructions: Stir vodka and dry vermouth with ice|Strain into a chilled martini glass|Garnish with an olive or lemon twist

name: Gin and Tonic
description: A refreshing cocktail with gin and tonic water
instructions: Pour gin into an ice-filled glass|Top with tonic water|Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Mojito
description: A refreshing cocktail with lime, mint, and rum
instructions: Muddle mint leaves and lime juice in a glass|Add sugar syrup and rum|Fill the glass with ice and top with soda water|Stir and garnish with a mint sprig

name: Old Fashioned
description: A classic cocktail with whiskey, sugar, and bitters
instructions: Muddle sugar and bitters in a glass|Add whiskey and stir|Fill the glass with ice and garnish with an orange peel

name: Daiquiri
description: A simple cocktail made with rum, lime juice, and sugar syrup
instructions: Shake rum, lime juice, and sugar syrup with ice|Strain into a chilled glass|Garnish with a lime wheel

name: Whiskey Sour
description: A tangy cocktail made with whiskey, lemon juice, and simple syrup
instructions: Shake whiskey, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice|Strain into an ice-filled glass|Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice

name: Cosmopolitan
description: A popular cocktail made with vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice
instructions: Shake vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice with ice|Strain into a chilled martini glass|Garnish with a lime wheel

name: Pina Colada
description: A tropical cocktail made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice
instructions: Blend rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice with ice|Pour into a chilled glass|Garnish with a pineapple slice

name: Manhattan
description: A classic cocktail made with whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters
instructions: Stir whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters with ice|Strain into a chilled glass|Garnish with a maraschino cherry

name: Margarita
description: A zesty cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec
instructions: Rim a glass with salt|Shake tequila, lime juice, and triple sec with ice|Strain into the glass and garnish with a lime wedge

name: Negroni
description: A bitter and complex cocktail made with gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth
instructions: Stir gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth with ice|Strain into a glass with ice|Garnish with an orange peel

name: Mint Julep
description: A refreshing cocktail with bourbon, mint, and sugar
instructions: Muddle mint leaves and sugar syrup in a glass|Add bourbon and fill the glass with crushed ice|Stir and garnish with a mint sprig

name: Bloody Mary
description: A savory cocktail made with vodka and tomato juice
instructions: Shake vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, and spices with ice|Strain into an ice-filled glass|Garnish with a celery stick and a lemon wedge

name: Mai Tai
description: A tropical cocktail made with rum, lime juice, and orgeat syrup
instructions: Shake rum, lime juice, orgeat syrup, and orange curaçao with ice|Strain into an ice-filled glass|Garnish with a lime wheel and a mint sprig

name: Sazerac
description: A strong cocktail made with rye whiskey, absinthe, and bitters
instructions: Rinse a glass with absinthe|Muddle sugar and bitters in a separate glass|Add rye whiskey and ice, stir, and strain into the absinthe-rinsed glass|Garnish with a lemon twist

name: Paloma
description: A refreshing cocktail made with tequila and grapefruit juice
instructions: Shake tequila, grapefruit juice, lime juice, and sugar syrup with ice|Strain into an ice-filled glass|Top with soda water and garnish with a lime wedge

name: Tom Collins
description: A fizzy cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, and soda water
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and sugar syrup with ice|Strain into an ice-filled glass|Top with soda water and garnish with a lemon slice

name: Caipirinha
description: A Brazilian cocktail made with cachaça and lime
instructions: Muddle lime wedges and sugar in a glass|Add cachaça and fill the glass with ice|Stir well and garnish with a lime wheel

name: Dark and Stormy
description: A spicy cocktail made with rum and ginger beer
instructions: Fill a glass with ice|Add rum and top with ginger beer|Garnish with a lime wedge

name: French 75
description: A sophisticated cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, and champagne
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and sugar syrup with ice|Strain into a champagne flute|Top with champagne and garnish with a lemon twist

name: Bellini
description: A sweet and fruity cocktail made with peach puree and prosecco
instructions: Pour peach puree into a champagne flute|Top with prosecco|Stir gently

name: Mimosa
description: A classic brunch cocktail made with orange juice and champagne
instructions: Pour orange juice into a champagne flute|Top with champagne|Gently stir

name: Sidecar
description: A tart cocktail made with cognac, triple sec, and lemon juice
instructions: Shake cognac, triple sec, and lemon juice with ice|Strain into a chilled glass|Garnish with a lemon twist

name: Pisco Sour
description: A South American cocktail made with pisco, lime juice, and egg white
instructions: Shake pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white with ice|Strain into a chilled glass|Garnish with a few drops of bitters

name: Tequila Sunrise
description: A vibrant cocktail made with tequila, orange juice, and grenadine
instructions: Pour tequila and orange juice into an ice-filled glass|Slowly add grenadine to create a gradient effect|Garnish with an orange slice

name: Aperol Spritz
description: A light and bubbly cocktail made with Aperol and prosecco
instructions: Fill a glass with ice|Add Aperol and prosecco|Top with soda water and garnish with an orange slice

name: Boulevardier
description: A bold cocktail made with whiskey, Campari, and sweet vermouth
instructions: Stir whiskey, Campari, and sweet vermouth with ice|Strain into a glass with ice|Garnish with an orange peel

name: Espresso Martini
description: A rich and caffeinated cocktail made with vodka and coffee liqueur
instructions: Shake vodka, coffee liqueur, and espresso with ice|Strain into a chilled martini glass|Garnish with coffee beans

name: Rusty Nail
description: A simple cocktail made with scotch and Drambuie
instructions: Fill a glass with ice|Add scotch and Drambuie|Stir gently and garnish with a lemon twist

name: Bee's Knees
description: A sweet and tangy cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, and honey syrup
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and honey syrup with ice|Strain into a chilled glass|Garnish with a lemon twist

name: Vesper
description: A strong and sophisticated cocktail made with gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc
instructions: Shake gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc with ice|Strain into a chilled martini glass|Garnish with a lemon twist

name: Gin Fizz
description: A light and frothy cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, and soda water
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, sugar syrup, and egg white with ice|Strain into a glass|Top with soda water and garnish with a lemon twist

name: Hemingway Daiquiri
description: A tart cocktail made with rum, lime juice, and maraschino liqueur
instructions: Shake rum, lime juice, grapefruit juice, and maraschino liqueur with ice|Strain into a chilled glass|Garnish with a lime wheel

name: Clover Club
description: A fruity cocktail made with gin, raspberry syrup, and egg white
instructions: Shake gin, raspberry syrup, lemon juice, and egg white with ice|Strain into a chilled glass|Garnish with a raspberry

name: Corpse Reviver #2
description: A refreshing cocktail made with gin, Cointreau, and Lillet Blanc
instructions: Shake gin, Cointreau, Lillet Blanc, and lemon juice with ice|Strain into a chilled glass|Garnish with a lemon twist

name: Rum Punch
description: A tropical cocktail made with rum, orange juice, and grenadine
instructions: Shake rum, orange juice, pineapple juice, lime juice, and grenadine with ice|Strain into an ice-filled glass|Garnish with a cherry and orange slice

name: Last Word
description: A complex cocktail made with gin, maraschino liqueur, and chartreuse
instructions: Shake gin, maraschino liqueur, chartreuse, and lime juice with ice|Strain into a chilled glass|Garnish with a lime wheel

name: Amaretto Sour
description: A sweet and tangy cocktail made with amaretto and lemon juice
instructions: Shake amaretto, lemon juice, and sugar syrup with ice|Strain into an ice-filled glass|Garnish with a cherry

name: Mai Tai Swizzle
description: A tropical variation of the Mai Tai with rum and orgeat syrup
instructions: Muddle mint leaves in a glass|Add rum, lime juice, orgeat syrup, and crushed ice|Swizzle until frosty and garnish with a mint sprig

name: Hurricane
description: A fruity and strong cocktail made with rum, passionfruit juice, and lime juice
instructions: Shake rum, passionfruit juice, lime juice, and grenadine with ice|Strain into an ice-filled glass|Garnish with a cherry and orange slice

name: Planter's Punch
description: A classic Caribbean cocktail made with rum, lime juice, and bitters
instructions: Shake rum, lime juice, sugar syrup, and bitters with ice|Strain into an ice-filled glass|Garnish with a lime wheel and a dash of bitters

name: Pimm's Cup
description: A refreshing and fruity cocktail made with Pimm's No. 1 and lemonade
instructions: Fill a glass with ice|Add Pimm's No. 1 and lemonade|Garnish with cucumber slices, mint, and fruit
